main.name: Mathias Porzier
main.description: I'm working as a freelancer at the moment, but I'm open to hear about new opportunities and projects !
main.bio: I'm a travel addict, a language learner, a great cook, but above all, I'm a programming fan ! After an existencial reflexion about my future, I decided to follow my passion and entered 42 School in Paris. I have then been hired for 6 months at Tactill, Paris, as a full-stack programmer.
main.softSkills: My main soft-skills are my ability to solve effectively problems with few pieces of information and to learn very quickly how to use new languages or tools, therefore I am swift and relevant when there is the need to find solutions.
main.projectExamples:
A few examples of projects on which I had the chance to work :
- Creation from scratch of a shell program Bash-like using C, following the POSIX requirements, including an AST execution, parsing and lexing, termcaps interface, shell redirections, job control, built-ins, regex …
- Creation of a data-pipeline from an API, using an ETL tool called StitchData, towards BigQuery, using Python
- Tasks and deployment automating on Google Cloud
- Creation of Google Apps Scripts add-ons to retrieve filtered data from APIs towards a Google Spreadsheet
- Deployment of Google Firebase Cloud Functions using Node.JS
- Web scraping programs, using Node.JS and Puppeteer, deployed on Apify

education.description: Computer science student @42 School Paris. I have learned how awesome programming can be, through intensive C learning, with projects including a complete shell recreation, a 3d wireframe viewer, recoding shell built-in functions like 'ls' or 'cd', or algorithms solving sudokus and Tetris puzzles.
Scientific high school diploma, option Engineering Science.

work.title: Web full-stack programmer
work.description: I'm working as a freelancer on projects such as :
projectExamples: - Construction of an analytic data stack: automatic retrieving of the data from different tools (like Intercom or Zapier) through an ETL tool (StitchData), sending it to Google BigQuery, formating/parsing of this raw data by DBT, and visualizing it on Google DataStudio.

work.title: Full-stack web developer
work.description: I have been working at Tactill for 6 months as a full-stack web developer. It was a thrilling experience of its versatility since I was building tools in response to the needs of the team and our customers. The most fulfilling aspect for me was the discovery of building clearer code, using functional programming, involving more code reviews, comments, clarity, and mathematical logic, for maximal maintainability. Some projects examples :
projectExamples: - AWS and Google Cloud Platform deployment automatization, including bash scripting and serverless functions
- API requesters on Google Apps Scripts to retrieve data on a Spreadsheet, through Google Sheets extensions
- Setting up and optimizing a static website using Jekyll

testimonials.text: Mathias serious and flexible person. He can learn and adapt himself quickly to the provided tools, is relevant, and keeps an eye on our goals. Keep going!
